name: AxisBankVoiceBanking
0:
”Alexa, Open Axis Bank.”
”Alexa, Launch Axis Bank.”
”Alexa, Start Axis Bank.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: axis bank
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Axis Bank Voice Banking - Powered by Axis Aha!


As we progress ahead, Axis Bank aims at simplifying banking experience and make it as simple as a daily conversation. We keep building delightful customer experiences by shifting gears of technological innovation.

With a strong conviction towards simplifying the user experience, we bring to you Axis Aha! - an AI-enabled conversation banking channel over Alexa to attend to your needs. Axis Bank Voice Banking allows you to enquire on your accounts and credit cards on Alexa-enabled devices such as Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Echo Spot, using simple voice commands.

Now, check your account balance, credit card bills, account statement, order cheque book & block card via simple voice commands
You'd need to link your account by following these simple steps:

• Open skill store in the Alexa App.
• Type Axis Bank Voice Banking
• Click on the Axis Bank skill and click 'Enable"
• You shall be directed to Axis Bank page to link your account
• Accept the T&C & proceed to link your account.
• Link your account using your Internet Banking Credentials 
• Set your unique Voice-PIN

You're ready...

Experience Axis Bank Voice Banking.
